data.name: Creature Creator
data.detailed_description:
Create your own creatures to explore online worlds with friends and collect parts to upgrade in this creative multiplayer experience!

The creator is comprised of three modes:
✔ BUILD: Shape your creature's body and attach customizable parts to it. Each part may include special abilities that contribute to your overall statistics!
✔ PAINT: Color your creature's body and attached parts, and change the pattern of your creature’s skin!
✔ PLAY: Bring your animated creation to life!

Upon release, the game and standalone creature creation tool will be made open source under the GPL-3 and MIT licenses, respectively. This will allow for creators of all disciplines to contribute to the project, let developers add creatures to their own commercial games, and provide students with a new solution to learn SOTA Unity technologies.

Disclaimer: This project is not affiliated, associated, authorized, endorsed by, or in any way officially connected to EA, or any of its subsidiaries or affiliates. The official website for SPORE can be found here: https://www.spore.com

data.short_description: BUILD. PAINT. PLAY. Create your own creatures to explore online worlds with friends and collect parts to upgrade in this creative multiplayer experience!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+ (1GB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 470
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+ (1GB)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
